最初は面白いがゲームバランスが悪すぎます。
やったことがない人のために書くとマップのそこいら中に
通行を塞げる木の板と窓が配置されており、生存側の
通行に対して殺人者側は5倍くらい時間がかかります。
つまり、事実的に通れません。

ここで問題なのが窓の方です。
木の板は使用後であれば殺人者側が破壊できるので、
逃げられたとしても今後優位に進められるようになる
のですが、窓は破壊不能で使用制限がありません。
そして、窓はいろんな建物内に配置されています。
このため、入口からある程度距離のある窓が存在
している建物は全て生存者側の絶対安置なのです。

窓を通るのはスペースボタンなのですが、殺人者側が
事実的に窓を使うことができないので、窓に逃げ込んだら
あとは殺人者が来るタイミングに合わせてぼっ立ちしながら
スペースボタンをタイミング良く押し続けて殺人者がいる反対
方面に繰り返し移動し続けるだけで事実的にもう捕まえられません。

このような窓枠安置を熟知している生存者が複数居ると殺人者側は
絶望です。生存者側が終了条件を満たしてもクリアすらもしないで
追いかけては窓に逃げ込まれ、煽られながら不要なオブジェクトを
取ったりしてポイント稼ぎされます。

Really starting to hate this game. EVERY GAMEPLAY IS SO LAGGY. Game has been release for almost 2 weeks and yet, nothing is done to improve this game. My internet connection speed is very fast so it cannot be my internet problem. It's the game fault.

Nach 20 Stunden in Dead by Daylight hab ich mich entschieden eine Review zu dem Spiel zu verfassen.


Über das Spiel:
Dead by Daylight hat mich von Anfang an gepackt. Man joined in ein Spiel und weiss nicht wo man ist, man weiss nicht wo die Generatoren sind welche repariert werden müssen und das Schlimmste ist: Man weiss nicht wo der Killer ist. Die Entwickler haben ein extrem ausgeglichenes Spiel für beide Rollen (Killer und Überlebender) geschaffen. Als Überlebender darf man in der 3rd-Person Ansicht spielen während man als Killer nur eine 1st-Person Sicht hat. 

Der Killer:
Ich selbst bin nicht gerne der Killer. Denoch hab ich mir einen Einblick verschafft und gemerkt das beide Rollen eine komplett andere Spielweise erfahren. Als Killer möchte ich zum Beispiel Bärenfallen stellen, an Orte von welchen ich glaube das sie nützen. Man geht jedem Geräusch nach das man hört nur um die Überlebenden zu finden. Sollte man einen gefangen haben und an einen Opfer-Haken gehängt haben, möchte man selbst da warten und hoffen das niemand ihn retten kommt. In dieser Zeit können von anderen Überlebenden Generatoren repariert werden und dies setzt den Killer unter Druck.

Der Überlebende:
Ins Spiel getappt und komplett ahnungslos wo meine Aufgaben sind muss ich mir als Überlebender erst einmal einen Überblick verschaffen. Ich laufe schmalen Wegen entlang, klettere über Fenster und schleiche durchs hohe Gras. Auf einmal höre ich einen lauten Herzschlag. Dies ist das Zeichen das der Killer sich mir nähert. Ich versuche ruhig zu bleiben doch der Herzschlag wird lauter. Ich werde nervös. Ich verstecke mich im hohen Gras. Auf einmal kommt zu dem leuten Herzschlag noch eine schreckliche Musik. Nun steht er neben mir. Ich sehe ihn an und möchte rennen doch im selben Augenblick zieht er weiter. Er hat mich nicht entdeckt. Noch muss ich nicht flüchten.


Was das Spiel spannend macht:

+ Faire Rollen. (Keine Rolle ist zu schwer)
+ Schöner Gruselfaktor
+ Verschiedene Maps mit verschiedenen Umgebungen (Viele Häuser oder ein Maisfeld)
+ Verschiedene Überlebende
+ Verschiedene Killer

Was sich noch bessern könnte:

- Kein Onlinespiel mit Freunden nur Lokal und ohne Charakter-Forschritte
- Kleinere Bugs im Menü
- Nur einen Spielmodus
- Keine oder nur sehr wenige individuelle Anpassmöglichkeiten des Charakters


Für jeden Freund der Horrorspiele kann ich Dead by Daylight bestens empfehlen. Es macht einfach mega Spass ständig unter Druck Aufgaben zu erledigen und auf Mitspieler zu achten.

Ich gebe Dead by Daylight eine 7/10

ちょっとやってみたが正直合わなかった。

コンセプトからするとB級ホラーの主人公になったような気持ちで遊べる
といったところではないかと思うけど、
そう思えるのはおそらく最初の数ゲームだけ。
協力・対戦ゲームである以上、縛りや悪ふざけは許容しづらい部分があるうえ、
ポイント制なるシステムがさらにそれを助長させている。

要するになにが気に入らないかっていうと、捕まっても吊るされるだけなのでまったく怖くないし、
追っかける側になっても、相手がほとんど攻撃手段を持たないだけで対して有利を感じないところ。

半端なレベル制や、持ち越しアイテムとかは正直いらないと思う。
なんでEvolveが過疎ってL4D2が未だに何万人がプレイしているのか、
ちゃんと考えて作っているのか甚だ疑問だった。

勝手な推測だが、今はコンセプトがウケてにぎわっているものの、
根本的なところを変えなければEvolve同様過疎ると思う。
確実に二番煎じとかが出てくると思うけど、その時このゲームの未来が決まる。

Вот и прошёл ещё один год нашей любимой всеми игры Dead by Daylight. Год был вполне насыщенный! Вышло 4 достаточно крутых главы. Не буду говорить, какая из них лучше, потому что каждая в чём-то по своему крутая! Что касается новой графики, то вполне неплохо. И самое главное, что игра не теряет при этом оптимизацию. А в некоторых моментах она даже получше стала. Будем надеяться, что и дальше будет всё в таком же духе. Ждём обновления карт, таких как Ферма, Красный лес, Кротус Пренн. Ну и хорошо бы уже новые карты тоже добавить. Желательно закрытые)) В общем и целом игра не сбавляет обороты. Всё ещё держится на уровне. Чему я безусловно рад! <3<3<3

GOOD

The game has potential to be better, with a few patches it could be greater. Until then I'll just leave this here.

Survivors vs Trapper Killer:
Survivor gets hooked and trapper places bear trap underneath them, then goes off to wait in the distance, so survivor(even high level players) suicide because freedom from the hook ain't happening.

Survivors vs Wraith:
Survivor gets put on hook, wraith goes to wait in stealth in the distance. As long as your other survivors are not hurt, you have a chance to get away as long as your willing survivors want to take a blow to their shoulder or they'll leave you for dead.

Survivors Vs Hillbilly:
Not much to say here because all the hillbillies use chainsaw, so if your being chased, hit a corner and they usually miss.

TL:DR The game basically says camp them until their dead if your the killer, if your a survivor then it's stay off the hooks or your already dead.

Best way I can describe this game?

When you were a child being chased by a bee,
This is the adult version of that situation.

Just that the bee is capable of picking up your whole body weight and squiring you onto a rusty meat hook, Actually it's a lot worse.

Recommended, made me anxious at every turn.

Sziasztok!

Merem ajánlani azoknak akik türelmesek és nagy a tűrőképességük ha játék hibákról van szó, részemről nagyon várós volt már egy olyan játék ami hozza a "tini amcsi horror" filmek hangulatát, és ebben nem is okozott csalódást.
Amit keveslek egyelőre az a pályák száma, illetve a 4 választható túlélő karakter, valamint a lobby rendszert reményeim szerint javítják-átírják mert gyötrelmes amikor ötödjére enged be a váróba, majd onnan is kidob, vagy már csatlakozás közben amennyiben kifagy(kilép?) egy társad, vagy a gyilkos, úgy hosszadalmas várakozás után dob csak vissza a főmenübe, jobb esetben a játékba.
Remélhetőleg ezeket a hibákat orvosolják és bővítik is majd a játékot pályákkal, választható karakterekkel, egyebekkel, és úgy egy nagyon élvezhető menekülős csapatjátékos horror játékot fogunk kapni idővel.

Üdv,
G

9 saat oynadıktan sonra diyebilirimki çok eğlenceli ve başarılı bir oyun.Oyunun bu kadar başarılı kılan sesleri oynanışı ve atmosferi.Tıpkı Outlastta olduğu gibi oyun sizi geriyor ve gerildikçe gerilmek istiyorsunuz.Oyunda pek çok eksi var ama artıları bastırıyor diyebilirim.
Artılar : İçine çeken mükemmel atmosfer
             Hoş grafikler 
             Başarılı ve uzun süreli oynandığında sıkmayan oynanabilirlik
             Başarılı level sistemi
Eksiler: Rank sisteminin adaletsiz olması
              Mikrofon kullanamamak(takım oyununa dayalı bir oyun)
              Lobby sisteminin olmaması
             Grafik ayarlarının detaysız olması(vsynch yi dosyadan kapamak zorunda kaldım)
              Yüksek level oyncuların birkaç adım önde olması(hemen hemen her oyunda olduğu gibi)


Bakalım bu inceleme burda kalsın eksilerden kaçı giderilecek :)

Really Good Game, I Would Recomend It To Anyone That Likes A 4v1 Style Game Where The 4 Cannot Attack The One And Just Have To Avoid Him As Much As Possible, I Dont Like That The Killer Hosts The Lobby Due To A Lot Of Killers Causing Lag In Game Which Makes It Frustrating, I Had To Jump Over A Window 3 Times And Still Got Hit By The Chainsaw Due This, If They Fix This Issue And A Couple Others Such As Survivors Glitching Out So No One Can Interact With Them When They Are Downed And Add A Survivor Party System Then This Game Would Be So Much Better 9/10

Эта игра просто взрыв мозга!) Играй за маньяка и РУБИ всё что движется! Или же попробуй совершить от него побег в компании таких же бедолаг как ты, главный залог которого командная работа. Игра завораживает начиная с главного меню, саундтрек и обстановка вокруг непренуджённо заставляют тебя полностью погрузиться в её атмосферу. Кто не играл, тому не понять то чувство которое я испытал в одной из каток: играю за выжившего повесил он значит тиммейта на крюк и стоит кемперит, другой идёт снимать его, а он хлоп и его, в итоге вся тима слилась таким же образом 10 и из 10 =). Игра действительно стоит вашего внимания даже если вы не любитель этого жанра. Она затягивает и постепенно ты начинаешь бросать спорт, учёбу, девушку, работу =_=
Oyunda hala arkadaşlarınla online oynayabilceğin lobi yok ve hala oyuna girerken en başa atıyor bunlar cözülürse süper bir oyun fakat  cözülmesse oynanmaz...
Jogo 10/10

I joined a match
I found a generator
I started fixing the generator
I failed the quick hit icon like a pleb
I heard the wraith bells coming my way
I hear the bells too close i dont have time
I leap the nearest window, but the wraith spots me
I try to keep it cool and stay below the window
I see the wraith stare in my direction
I immediately shit my trousers
The wraith shakes his head in a disproval kind of way
I start tea bagging because i dont know what else to do
He turns to the generator then turns to me
I am terrified but i think he wants to help me
I acknowledge his head signal and go to the generator and start fixing it
He is behind me and i am completly vulnurable 
I trust him and finish fixing my generator
The rest of my team got other generators by the time i finished
He escorts me to safety and i open the exit
I teabag next to him letting him know im thankful
I leave with big payout for surviving
Ill never forget that one kind wraith 

Moral of the story: not everyone with an axe made of a human skull is evil.

So, this game has bugs, we know this, this game has glitches, we know this, this game has op as fudge killers, we all know this, but to this point i have been playing this game for 19.6 hours and i have loved every minute of it. Some of my friends get a bit bored because its repetitive, we also know this, but if you change your tactics and okay it a bit more ballsy, its great. theres only one thing that frustrates me and that is camping killers, whilst a killer is chilling out next to me, smoking his pipe getting ready for his next spree, the other suriviors are escaping, chase them man cmon!!! but other than that a great game, i love playing as the survivor because it takes actual skill, get skill brah!! playing as the killer is great too, I sometimes allow for the players to fix all the gens to get all the points they can and then kill them, so i get points too, in those cases its a win win sitch, but dont be a douch bag camping killer, communities will hate you for it.

一晃杀机都六周年了，除了禁播杀机最近还喜提叔叔禁视频，属于是官方勋章了。
为啥要改好评，是现版本bug都修复了嘛？
并没有，bug还是多如牛毛。
但作为一个老游戏，过了6年还在不断更新，不断和经典恐怖角色做联动的也只此一家了。
希望能看到这个游戏的十周年。

------------------------------------这是改评论的分割线————————————————————-

第一次给一个游戏差评。
按理说，一个游戏的好坏要从很多方面去讨论，但是
你特么能让我先好好玩一下这个游戏么？
动不动无响应，
动不动卡房间，
动不动卡bug，
玩了黎明杀机，我觉得我欠法国土豆厂一个道歉。
[spoiler]实际游戏时间大概只有steam显示的1/3，其余时间都在退出重进，极度不推荐[/spoiler]

Its early days as I am a newbie to this game but they have to figure out a quicker way to get games started. You sit there waiting for survivors to join and dozens of people pop in and out and once you have 4 it starts a countdown timer for a minute, only to have some muppet drop out and start the process all over again. Game play seemed ok and fun with loads of tension. Im holding my final opinion about this game until Ive played if for a few weeks but so far I just spend ages waiting for games to start.

It's solid enough... Just expect to get caught up it the same kind of game play mechanics overkill that you found in left for dead and payday: lots of progression but with a better team making system that actually lets the power players just quit instead of ruining the match.

[h1]Dead by Daylight[/h1] ist ein cooles Gelegenheitsspiel - für manche vielleicht ein Suchtspiel - was anfangs richtig Spaß machte es zu spielen. Nachdem ihr einpaar Runden gespielt habt, wisst ihr umgefähr wie das Spiel funktioniert. Als Überlebender in den niedrigen Rängen war es noch einfach die Generatoren anzuschalten und zu entkommen. 

Euer Ziel als Überlebender ist es Generatoren anzuschalten um die Ausgangstore mit Energie zu versorgen und zu entkommen.
Das Ziel des Killer ist es alle überlebenden zu töten, dazu kann er sie niederschlagen und verbluten lassen oder auf Haken aufhängen, geht deutlich schneller.
Nach jeder Runde die ihr gespielt habt, bekommt ihr Punkte mit denen ihr euch Perks (Fähigkeiten), Gegenstände (z.B. Werkzeugkasten), Opfergaben (z.B. ihr erhaltet nach bestimmten Aktionen 25% mehr Punkte) und Addons für die Gegenstände ( z.B. wenn ihr ein Werkzeugkasten ausgerüstet habt, könnt ihr zusätzliche Bonis hinzufügen) freischalten könnt.

Es gibt momentan [b]vier Überlebende[/b], diese unterscheiden sich nur in ihrem Aussehen sowie Bekleidung (je dunkler die Bekleidung desto besser)  und [b]drei Killer[/b] mit jeweils verschiedenen einzigartigen Fähigkeiten (z.B. der Fallensteller, kann Bärenfallen aufstellen)

Die Grafik ist sehr düster, dunkel gestaltet wie es in einem Horrorgame eben so ist - mir gefällt sie sehr.
Es gibt jedoch noch einige Bugs die manchmal ärgerlich sind (z.B. Ihr hängt am Haken und ein anderer Spieler versucht euch zu befreien. Nachdem er euch vom Haken heruntergeholt hat, bugt es euch in den Holzmast und ihr könnt nicht weglaufen :(  ).

+ Grafik
+ atmospärisch
+ Maps generieren sich immer neu

- Bugs
- ihr könnt noch nicht z.B. zu zweit in eine Lobby mit fremden Spielern (wird daran gearbeitet)

Hide and be seek be scary yooooooo

I watched various streamers play this on twitch and I enjoyed watching.  I purchased the game and played for about 4 hours both as killer and survivor.  I'm not sure why but I expected the gameplay to be exciting but it was actually just what it seems... a glorified hide and seek game.  Not only is it lacking in replayability, as a very low level killer/survivor I was matched up with MUCH higher level opponents that I of course lost to.  There is also a warez version of this game that can be played on multiplayer allowing hackers to play against/with legit players.  They can use best game perks, which I saw first hand, during my ownership of this game.  Here I am level 2 killer against a level 28 survivor that has 4 very rare perks and a super rare offering.

This game is great to watch others play on twitch from time to time but as a game to play yourself I would pass it by.  Refunded after 4 hours.  Thank you steam!

This game is either really hard, or there are cheaters.. It would be more fun if they had an anti cheat thing to fix the game.  Besides that, the game is pretty awesome... wish they had more content and maps.

I love this game. Played it for almost 40 hours and I just love it, playing as both the survivor and the killer is a unique experience and I would recommend this game. It, like most other games that have just came out, has a few bugs ranging from hitting the tree despite not touching the model of it to hitting the plank as a killer and getting launched outside the map. But I have high hopes for this game, and I recommend this to anyone.

I was very hesitant when buying this game. I was worried that the launch was just a few days ago and I heard it had several bugs, also that it was pretty much one game mode. Anyways, even though I was hesitant, I bought it. During my time with this game i've dealt with long loading screens and the bug where you can't pick up a survivor as the killer. Yea, it sucked whenever that happened. BUT, i've been having loads of fun playing this game, it's competitive, it's a bit scary although you always want more! It just makes you feel so awesome when you survive or when you actually outsmart the survivors and sacrifice all of them. If you like Depth or games like Left 4 Bread, I think you'll really enjoy this game. I can only hope that the devs continue to improve/support and add more content to make this game the best that it can be.

Cool idea for asymmetrical multiplayer. There are some links with joining matches and issues with Bluetooth audio (not a problem for most people I imagine) but the game is early access and most of those issues will likely be sorted out eventually.

I really enjoyed this game, I put how many hours into it so obviously I enjoy it. I don't know how anyone can dislike a game if they put this many hours into it. Like seriously if you didn't like it wouldn't you have stopped playing before putting so many hours?

I don't typically write reviews, but this is a 'killer' game. It's a lot of fun, however you'll notice if you're a survivor that right now the state of the game isn't too great: There's a TON of wallhackers that play the killer, and they can see EVERYONE and EVERYTHING on the maps. It's ridiculous. 9 of my last 15 games were wallhacking killers who killed everyone within 3 minutes. That's just awful. There needs to be a solid anti-cheat if this game wants to compete with the upcoming Friday the 13th game. Speaking of Friday the 13th game, hopefully they are paying attention to the exploits and go hardcore Blizzard style on cheaters and name and shame them all on the forum, as well as perma-ban the steam account. The game is so irresponsibly broken with wallhacks, that it needs a solid system in place to deal with these kinds of losers. 


GREAT CONCEPT. GREAT GRAPHICS (I run a 1080 GTX), fun when playing with legit players. Not fun when you die at the start of every game. Wouldn't recommend until they fix with a SOLID anti-cheat system in place, that detects these bots. It's awful... so as much as I LOVE this breath of fresh air for a concept and game, it's so overshadowed with the TONS and TONS of cheaters. On top of that, killers are highly unbalanced anways. Iron Grip makes it impossible to escape, and the fact that throwing up an obstacle doesn't do much really tilts the game in massive favor of the killer. Add wallhacks to that, and the game isn't even fun to play.

5/10. Great concept. I'll play when these guys announce a much better anti-cheat system in place.

No matter how many issues there are, there is always something I find that makes this game fun again. I stopped playing for about a year because my friends began leaving it and I chose to follow them. I decided to come back and try it out last week and I got hooked again. Even though they barely fix the main bugs and work more on the content, I still think it is a decent game. Although, it is a game you should play with friends because when playing solo, it can be difficult to communicate with your teammates. There is no mic in-game sadly so you can not talk to anyone, which makes me kind of sad, but other than that, I think it is a great game. I recommend it to anybody who loves suspenseful multiplayer games.

Dead by Daylight is [strike]Dead by Daylight[/strike] [b]Starting[/b] to shine 


Pros:
 
+ Survival team-based gameplay 

+ Relive the slasher flicks as a killer

+ Unlocks and progression system (with additional skill-based ranking)

+ variation for survivors and killers (4 different survivors and 3 different killers with their own customization albeit limited for now)

+ Audio is well done


Cons:

- "Team-based" gameplay has no in-game voice chat (can't strategize with fellow survivors) [i]mic is now longer disabled but no in-game chat[/i]

- [strike]Cannot lobby with friends without repeatedly entering and exiting lobbys[/strike] [i]Can now group lobby with friends[/i]

- [strike]No counter to killer that camps  "hooked" survivors[/strike] [i]Using yourself as bait and working as a team "can" resolve this[/i]

- [strike]killers are rewarded for survivors leaving the match early and survivors are penalized if the killer leaves early[/strike] Fixed

- buggy game overall

- long loading screens and wait times for matches

- [strike]Not alot of options for configuring the game to your liking. This is pc after all... (controls,[/strike] audio, graphics, etc) [i]Can now configure controls (M&K and controller) and some basic settings[/i]

- [strike]skill-based ranking system is heavily stacked against survivors even more so with the 1.0.2 patch[/strike] [i]skill-based ranking system is challenging but the fairest it's ever been as per the 1.1 patch [/i]


What needs to be done:

~ [strike]group pre-lobbying (for friends)[/strike] 

~ in-game and lobby voice chat (lobby can be exclusive to survivors while in-game can be proximity for fairness)

~ [strike]If anyone leaves (before they are killed) they should be penalized even killers[/strike]

~ [strike]make it so the survivors can counter (2 sec stun from behind, or something) for killers camping "hooked" survivors[/strike]

~ regular updates for bug-fixing, balancing between survivors and killers, and lobby system (adjusting the skill-based ranking system would be one thing) [i] they are working on this and doing a better job to boot[/i]

update 1:
I want this game to succeed but more care needs to be taken into account if this game is going to survive the night. This may include re-examining the initial goal of what this game is supposed to accomplish. Focus on gameplay that heavily rewards those who assist their team rather than selfish gameplay would increase the player base and make this game more rewarding for all parties.

update 2:
Would reccomend this for players who game in groups. If you prefer to lone wolf this game (without chatting) it will seem cruel for newcomers. Most players will not be able to take on or avoid the killer single-handedly unless the killer is atrocious. Personally even with all the downsides the game is quite fun. If your not ready to suffer for enjoyment you might want to holdout until the game is fixed.

update 3:
As per 1.1 - 1.1.1 the game is quite balanced and I can notice alot more survivors ranking up. Players are rewarded for playing intelligently such as distracting the killer and assisting team mates. This actually gets you more points than rushing the objective 100% of the time. I'm looking forward to more updates to see if they can keep this happy medium or advance it further.

Dont waste your money on this trash game. The creaters are stupid because they removed infinites and nerfed survivors. But the funny part is they still have not removed iron grasp or nerfed it and they still have not nerfed the killer so this game should be better because the killer is to overpowered

[u]Pros[/u]
-Can be played and enjoyed with friends or by yourself
-Many characters to chose from on both sides as well as perks
-Cosmetic and perk customization
-Mind games
-Great atmosphere
-Some truly terrifying Killers to be chased by or to be used (That Demigorgon, Hag, Nurse, Spirit, etc)
-Community is super alive and engaging
-Devs still support this game with updates and releases of content


[u]Cons[/u]
-Lack of deep features, such as alternative game modes, like 2 Killers vs 8 survivors
-Lack of deep gameplay. Survivors need to fix gens and leave, maybe save someone now and then. Nothing complex
-Costly cosmetics
-Some DLC Killers suck. Some Killers are just an improved version of a former Killer
-Certain perks are generally useless, because they are extremely situational or easily destroyed
-Community is super whiny at times or "toxic" for those who can't handle words 
-Devs don't take any real risks in developing new, unique features
-DLC sales aren't as good as they could be

Ok.. I held off on a review until I could completely undertand everything on both the survivor and killer sides of things. Verdict is:  Great game. Awesome ideas and well worth your time\ cash.

 However--
Minor annoyances that angered me enough to shut the game off were 

1.The unbalanced speed of survivors at higher ranks to lower ranked killers
(Speed perks and easy healing )
2.The infinite ledge\window jumping the survivors and the excess amount of palettes!   
(the killer is slow...How about a stamina bar for survivors to combat this endless chase of window hopping while the other survivors get generators and you witness a survivor t-bag and troll you because they know the limitations of the killer)
3.bad matchmaking and no voice chat
4.The stupid IDLE FUCKERS that dont ready up in the damn lobby... i feel like im playing cod zombies all over again!
aside from those little things i think the game is great.  you have a bug list guys.. get to work and fix these problems.

Dead by Daylight - это когда в 4 человека чинишь генератор и вдруг подходит невидимый араб и ты ловишь маслину.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты заходишь в лобби, хочешь сыграть каточку, но четвертый выживший обязательно будет с него ливать в бесконечных поисках друга (мне плевать на всех - сам не играю и другим не даю). После чего эти ищейки узнают много нового о себе, о своих родственниках, и о том, с кем его мамка ходила в кино. 

Dead by Daylight - это когда вы вместе с маньяком кружите хоровод вокруг булыжника.

Dead by Daylight -  это когда кудрявый может махать руками и хуй пойми как сломать крюк.

Dead by Daylight - это когда очкарик может на дистанции 1337 километр  помогать другим.

Dead by Daylight - это когда нигер баба может из травы делать препятсвия и ими же лечить раны.

Dead by Daylight - это когда баба с ростом как карлик и с -1 размеров груди бегает быстрее гепарда.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты светишь маньяку фонариком в лицо,а в ответ получаешь пилой по имбальнику.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты видишь,как твой напарник убегает от маньяка... в твою сторону... и маньяк продолжает охоту ужe за тобой.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты сидишь в кукурузе и тут тебе в спину влетает пила.

Dead by Daylight - это когда уже надо открыть выходы, ты попадаешь в капкан и тебя уносять в падик на крюк.

Dead by Daylight - это когда баги могут спасти тебе жизнь, а иногда нет.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты хочешь играть в эту игру и хочешь.

Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяк наступает в МЕДВЕЖИЙ капкан,но ему наплевать так как его ноги сделаны из ТИТАНА.

Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты купил делюкс издание, но толку от него нет, кроме 3 ключей для БЕТЫ.

11/10 Двайтов.
